alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 16 at 10:31AM CST until December 21 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Carthage. * WHEN...From Sunday evening to late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding of low areas along and near the river is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 15.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Sunday evening to a crest of 18.0 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Pearl River Carthage 17.0 15.1 Fri 9 am CST 15.6 16.2 17.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 8 PM CST.
